meanings.definition: The plants of a particular region, habitat, or geological period.
meanings.sent1: The floras in the rainforest are diverse and colorful.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the local floristic composition to understand the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The floristic variety in my garden makes it a botanical wonderland.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of floristic patterns is as rich as a blooming meadow.
meanings.sent5: The floristic tapestry of the desert is a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A book or other work that describes the plants of a particular region.
meanings.sent1: I borrowed a flora from the library to identify the wildflowers.
meanings.sent2: The flora of North America is well-documented in this guidebook.
meanings.sent3: Reading the flora felt like taking a stroll through a botanical garden.
meanings.sent4: The flora on her shelf was a treasure trove of plant knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The detailed illustrations in the flora brought the plants to life.
